byline.contributor: Hannah Olivennes contributed reporting from London.

abstract: West African leaders demand reinstatement of Burkina Faso's interim President Michel Kafando, who was overthrown in recent coup; demonstrators protest in capital of Ouagadougou; Army units have entered city but coup leader Gen. Gilbert Diendere refuses to surrender.
lead_paragraph: The army said it would move to disarm an elite regiment, loyal to the former president, that toppled the government last week.

headline.main: African Leaders Call for Reinstatement of President of Burkina Faso
headline.print_headline: West African Leaders Push for Peaceful End to Coup in Burkina Faso

snippet: The army said it would move to disarm an elite regiment, loyal to the former president, that toppled the government last week.

keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
keywords.name: subject
